short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically applies RTL for Skool website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension adds Right-to-Left (RTL) support to Skool, making it easier to read and navigate for users of languages like Hebrew and Arabic. It automatically adjusts the text direction for a seamless experience on the platform.
